title: Adobe AdCloud Search Keyword Performance Report Full Extension
description: Adobe AdCloud Search Keyword Performance Report Full Extension. Contains all Solution added fields.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.title: Internal Account ID
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.description: Unique identifier for the account this event is associated to.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.title: Search Engine Campaign ID
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.description: Unique identifier for the campaign which this event is associated to.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.title: Search Engine AdGroup ID
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.description: Unique identifier for the adgroup which this event is associated to.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.title: Search Term ID
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.description: Unique identifier for the  term which this event is associated to.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.title: Internal Advertiser or User ID
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.description: Unique identifier for the advertiser which this event is associated to.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.title: Search Engine ID
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.description: Unique identifier for the Search Engine which this event is associated to.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.title: Keyword Match Type
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.description: Match Type associated to the Keyword being targeted for the Ad.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud/.description: Adobe AdCloud Search Ad Performance Measure Custom Fields.
